pages.text: > $(n)Health:$() 20  $(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() $(br)5 on easy, 8 on normal, 12 on hard, 5 Wither Damage $(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Hostile     $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Nether Fortress  $(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)$(thing)Wither Skeletons$() are immune to fire and the $(thing)Wither effect$(). They still seek shade or water during daylight if they are in the Overworld although they do not burn in sunlight. Like most undead mobs, they sink in $(item)Water$() but do not drown, are healed by $(thing)Instant Damage$() and harmed by $(thing)Instant Health$() effects, are immune to $(thing)Regeneration$() and $(thing)Poison effects$().
$(n)Drops:$() 0-2 Bones, 1/3 chance Coal, 2.5% chance for a Wither Skeleton Skull / 100% chance if killed by a Charged Creeper, 8.5% chance for Equipment  $(br)$(n)XP:$() 5-17
